If this sounds like your team, Opsee is for you.

You use AWS

Opsee works seamlessly with AWS. We discover the instances, groups, and services in your environment and make it easy to attach health checks to them.

You build microservices

Opsee is made for microservices. We discover and attach health checks to new instances as soon as they come online, so you never have to worry about what’s covered.

You want basic monitoring

You need monitoring–you’re not building a NOC. Opsee helps you quickly set up health and performance checks with useful notifications.

You need security

The Opsee Bastion is a self-contained AMI that you launch in your AWS environment to coordinate and run health checks. There’s no agent to install.
